mapper.select: SELECT a.resno, a.rdate, c1.content as item, c5.content as item_bcd, d.aname, d.ano, m.mname, p.petno, p.petname, c2.content as species, c3.content as gender, p.petweight , c4.content as status, a.memo, a.rstatus_mcd, a.start_time, a.rtime, ch.resno as cresno, m.memail FROM APPOINTMENT a JOIN ADMIN d ON a.ano = d.ano JOIN MEMBER m ON a.memno = m.memno JOIN MEDICAL_ITEM t ON a.mcode = t.mcode JOIN PET p ON a.petno = p.petno JOIN COMMON c1 ON c1.bcd = t.mtitle_bcd AND c1.mcd = t.mtitle_mcd JOIN COMMON c5 ON c5.bcd = t.mtitle_bcd AND c5.mcd = 999 JOIN COMMON c2 ON c2.bcd = p.PETSPECIES_BCD AND c2.mcd = p.PETSPECIES_MCD JOIN COMMON c3 ON c3.bcd = p.PETGENDER_BCD AND c3.mcd = p.PETGENDER_MCD JOIN COMMON c4 ON c4.bcd = a.RSTATUS_BCD AND c4.mcd = a.RSTATUS_MCD -- 차트 존재 여부 확인 LEFT OUTER JOIN CHART ch ON a.RESNO = ch.RESNO WHERE a.resno = #{resno}
mapper.update: UPDATE appointment SET rtime = #{rtime}, memo = #{memo}, rstatus_mcd = #{status} WHERE resno = #{resno}
mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT, BCD FROM COMMON WHERE SCD = 100 AND MCD = 999
SELECT c.CONTENT, c.MCD FROM COMMON c, MEDICAL_ITEM m WHERE c.MCD = m.MTITLE_MCD AND c.BCD = m.MTITLE_BCD AND c.SCD = 100 AND c.BCD = #{bcd} AND c.BCD != 999 AND m.MSTATUS_MCD = 100
SELECT ano, aname FROM ADMIN WHERE alevel_mcd = 200 AND astatus_mcd = 100
SELECT SCHDATE, SCHTYPE_MCD, ANO FROM SCHEDULE WHERE (SCHTYPE_MCD = 100 OR (SCHTYPE_MCD = 200 AND ANO = #{ano}) OR (SCHTYPE_MCD = 300 AND ANO = #{ano})) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM schdate) = #{month}
SELECT RDATE, START_TIME, RTIME FROM APPOINTMENT WHERE RDATE = TO_DATE(#{rdate}, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND ANO = #{ano}
SELECT MEMNO, MNAME, MTEL, SUBSTR(MEMAIL, 1, INSTR(MEMAIL, '@')-1) as MEMAIL FROM MEMBER WHERE MNAME LIKE '%' || #{search1} || '%' AND MSTATUS_MCD = 100

AND ch.resno IS NOT NULL
AND ch.resno IS NULL
